name: Hard to Repair (Sebastian Weichelt)
description:
Play togehter with friends in a hot seat style game!

As a team, you must give band aids to Gary, the friendly heart. But you must also take care of your own Heart! Bob, the blue blob wants you to keep the band aids for yourself.

If Gary does not get enough band aids he will die! If that happens everybody loses.

If Gary survives, the player who took the most band aids for themself wins
